summary.span: 用于从预先存在的 对象创建复合活动的抽象基类。

span.span: An abstract base class used to create composite activities from pre-existing objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是活动类型层次结构中的基类。 is the base class in the activity type hierarchy. 所有其他活动类型（例如 、、、 和 ）均是从此类派生的。All other activity types such as , , , , and derive from this class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 派生类的简单实现。The following example shows a simple implementation of an derived class.

summary.span: 创建并验证活动的自变量、变量、子活动和活动委托的说明。

span.span: Creates and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流运行时使用 的默认实现来确保工作流构造正确，以及管理运行时关系和生存期规则。The workflow runtime uses the default implementation of to ensure correct construction of a workflow as well as to manage runtime relationships and lifetime rules. 的默认实现使用活动类型的 来检查该类型的公共属性。The default implementation of examines the public properties of the activity type using the type’s . 这些公共成员的类型包括：、、`IEnumerable`、、`IEnumerable` 或 。These public members are of type , , `IEnumerable`, , `IEnumerable`, or . 您可以重写此方法，以自定义活动的运行时说明的生成并提供自定义的验证逻辑。You can override this method to customize the building of the activity’s run-time description and to provide custom validation logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过将多个 Activity 对象包含在 Sequence 活动或其他复合活动中，可以将执行逻辑作为多个 Activity 对象来实现。The execution logic can be implemented as several Activity objects by containing them in a Sequence activity or other composite activity.
